title: Non Functional Requirement
description: A representation of a non-functional requirement, loosely based on Simmons/Intel 2011

Category.description: Category: A text field representing the category that the requirement is classified under in the NFR Model.

Context.description: Context: A text field representing the requirement, unique within a category.

Goals.description: Goals: Natural language description of the intent of the requirement and how it supports one or more of the general goals. The Goal is equivalent to 'Gist:' in Planguage or 'Ambition' in (Simmons/Intel 2011).

Rationale.description: Rationale: The reason that the requirement exists. Expressed in natural language.

Requirement.description: Requirement: The requirement to which the system will be held, expressed in constrained natural language.

Scale.description: Scale: The scale of measure used to quantify the requirement.

Status.description: Status: One of Draft, Approved, Revised, or other constrained choice of statuses matching the requirements implementing process.
